articles.title: Italy urges EU peers to test China arrivals for COVID-19, but many say 'no' - CNA
articles.description: ROME/BRUSSELS: Italy on Thursday (Dec 29) urged the rest of the European Union to follow its lead and test travellers from China for COVID-19, but others said they saw no need to do so for now or were waiting for a common stance across the largely borderless …
articles.content: But earlier on Thursday, Brigitte Autran, head of the French health risk assessment committee COVARS, said: "From a scientific point of view, there is no reason at this stage to bring back controls a… [+1593 chars]

articles.author: Jasper Jolly
articles.title: European gas prices fall to pre-Ukraine war level - The Guardian
articles.description: Milder winter, alternative imports and energy reduction cuts demand after Russian invasion pushed up prices
articles.content:
European gas prices have dipped to a level last seen before Russia launched its invasion of Ukraine in February, after warmer weather across the continent eased concerns over shortages.
The month-ah… [+3680 chars]

articles.author: Mariyan Slavov
articles.title: Redmi K60 might come to Europe as the Poco F5 Pro, according to Polish leaker - PhoneArena
articles.description: According to a tweet from MIUI Polska writer Kacper Skrzypek (his track record is unclear), the Redmi K60 will be called the Poco F5 Pro when it is released in global markets.
articles.content: Furthermore, the series comes with a 64MP+8MP+2MP camera system and a base price of 2,499 yuan (around $359) in China. According to Skrzypek, the price in Europe will be a bit different, and the alle… [+692 chars]

articles.title: EU health officials seek joint stance on COVID-19 measures towards China - CNA
articles.description: BRUSSELS: The European Union's Health Security Committee called an urgent meeting in Brussels on Thursday (Dec 29) to coordinate the bloc's response to China's decision to lift its COVID-19 restrictions amid a wave of infections there, the European Commission…
articles.content: "The EU Health Security Committee is meeting ... to discuss the COVID-19 situation in China and possible measures to be taken in a coordinated way," the European Commission's health directorate-gener… [+781 chars]
